channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car idling next to nursery, 23rd January
item.description:
Today I went to pick up my children from nursery. When I arrived there was a car parked right outside the fence with the engine running. The kids were playing outside so my children were basically 2 meters away from the exhaust. I politely asked the driver to switch off his engine but he refused to do so, used profane expletives, and tried to intimidate me.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Mary's Square, Paddington, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Dog excrement on pavement- kids have walked thru, 23rd January
item.description:
Large dog poop - kids walked through. It from school and is spread down pavement - not good unhygienic for primary school kids nearby
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Headcorn Road, Sundridge, Greater London

item.title: Bus stop E Blackheath Station towards Lee Green Or Lewisham : all timetables gone missing in last couple of days, 23rd January
item.description:
Bus stop E Blackheath Station towards Lee Green Or Lewisham : all timetables gone missing in last couple of days See photos &&& In addition the right hand display case door is warped and was poorly secured for some time before this Needs replacements for 54 89 108 202 N89 & SL4 Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bennett Park, Kidbrooke, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud verge, 23rd January

item.title: The foot way has been blocked off on the east side of Deepdene Road around number 28 Bellegrove Road. This is fairway high wooden boarding with no signs or provisions for pedestrians. This is quite perilous at a busy location and potentially dangerous especially for anyone with sight problems., 23rd January
item.description:
Potentially dangerous for pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Bellegrove Road, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Potholes, 23rd January
item.description:
A number of potholes located on Monkfrith way, just north of friar's walk on BOTH carriageways. A couple have been filled recently but MANY more remain..why weren't these filled too?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brunswick Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paving slabs sticking up and many broken., 23rd January
item.description:
This is a problem that has been noticeable for a long time. There is a whole stretch of bad paving on Radbourne Road running along the side of Telferscot School. I have noticed it because it is the area from my house that leads to the bus stop. Whilst the paving on the Hyde Farm Estate area is generally not good ( adjacent Wandsworth has replaced many of their streets locally with new paving), this particular area seems especially bad and in my opinion presents a significant trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Telferscot Road, Streatham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
